<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Warrior's Training Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=481)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Fall of Plaguestone</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 58</row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

**Frequency** once per day

**Trigger** You make an attack with a weapon in which you’re untrained; You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll. If you are an expert in any weapon, you instead gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the attack roll.

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ring is utilitarian in design—indicating its martial use. Its band is decorated only with a simple, sharp-edged sculpture on the band’s center. While wearing this ring, you add your level to your attack rolls with all weapons with which you are untrained.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
